_header: At London in England not full long sithen
Subjects: saints’ lives; Erkenwald, saint, life of
_description: Life of St Erkenwald — in alliterative unrhymed verse

BLHar2250.First Lines:
AT London in Englond noȝt full long sythenSythen crist suffrid
                    on cross & cristendome stablyd…
BLHar2250.Last Lines:
…Þai passyd forthe in procession & alle þe pepull
                    folowidAnd All þe belles in þe burgh beryd at ones
